General.Name: Carlyle Commodities Corp.
General.Description: Carlyle Commodities Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral resource properties in Canada and Mexico. It primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. The company holds 100% interests in the Newton gold-silver project properties located in the Clinton Mining division of British Columbia; and the Owl Lake property located in the Hemlo Schreiber Greenstone Belt, Ontario. It also has an option to acquire 100% interests in the Sunset mining property that consists of four mineral claims located in British Columbia; and the Cecilia gold-silver project situated in Sonora, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Delrey Metals Corp. and changed its name to Carlyle Commodities Corp. in February 2020. Carlyle Commodities Corp. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
